com.googlecode.n_orm.memory

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.n_orm.memory.Memory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleStore

    public class Memory
extends Object
implements SimpleStore
    Reference implementation for a store based on ConcurrentSkipListMap. This store entirely resides into memory, and is only available for the current JVM. It is well suited for testing. This store is thread-safe. This store does not supports mixing incrementing and absolute values.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Memory.Table
      An map to store rows within tables.

    • Method Detail

      • subMap

        protected static <T> NavigableMap<String,T> subMap(NavigableMap<String,T> map,
                                String fromIncl,
                                String toIncl)
        Utility method used internally to find a sub-map with inclusive nullable start and stop keys.
        Parameters:
        map - the map to be searched-in
        fromIncl - the start key ; can be null to state the start of the map
        toIncl - the last key ; can be null to state the end of the map
        Returns:
        a sub-map (can be map or a view on map)

      • getTable

        public Memory.Table getTable(String table,
                    boolean createIfNecessary)
        Returns the in-memory table.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the expected table
        createIfNecessary - whether to create the table if it does not exist
        Returns:
        the table ; can be null if createIfNecessary is set to false and the table does not exist

      • getRow

        public Memory.Table.Row getRow(String table,
                      String id,
                      boolean createIfNecessary)
        Returns the in-memory row (compatible with Row) from a table.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table in which to find the row
        id - the unique identifier for the row within the table
        createIfNecessary - whether to create the row if it does not exist (including in case table does not exists)
        Returns:
        the row ; can be null if createIfNecessary is set to false and the row or the table does not exist

      • getFamily

        public Memory.Table.Row.ColumnFamily getFamily(String table,
                                      String id,
                                      String family,
                                      boolean createIfNecessary)
        Returns the in-memory column family for a given row from a table.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table in which to find the column family for the row
        id - the unique identifier for the row within the table
        family - the name of the column family to be found within the row
        createIfNecessary - whether to create the row if it does not exist (including in case table or row does not exists)
        Returns:
        the row ; can be null if createIfNecessary is set to false and the column family or the row or the table does not exist

      • get

        public Row.ColumnFamilyData get(String table,
                       String id,
                       Set<String> families)
                         throws DatabaseNotReachedException
        Description copied from interface: SimpleStore
        Returns all elements in families ; no side-effect. In case element with the given key is missing, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        get in interface SimpleStore
        Parameters:
        table - the table from which to find the element
        id - the unique identifier (i.e. the key) with which the element was stored
        families - the set of column families to be activated ; should never be null or empty
        Returns:
        the data stored for each family ; null if and only if the id does not exist in the table
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotReachedException
